notes: Excellent modern apartment in very clean condition with contemporary finishes including open kitchen with island, modern appliances, and stylish lighting. The unit is on the 16th floor of a 19-story building, which strongly indicates elevator access. For baby safety, the balcony has floor-to-ceiling glass doors with proper railings visible, the kitchen bar stools may need securing, and there are no visible stairs. Good natural light from multiple windows in the bedroom.
